main event: A witness observed a cigar-shaped craft, approximately 60-70 feet long, hovering at an altitude of 100-150 feet before rapidly shooting away to the south.
interesting points: The object appeared solid and metallic, without any visible windows, vents, or external features.
The object hovered in place briefly before accelerating and departing at an extremely rapid rate of speed.
This was not the first time the witness had seen an object like this, though no details are provided about previous sightings.
The witness believes the object may have been some type of advanced aerial vehicle.
The weather conditions at the time of the sighting were clear, with a dry and calm atmosphere.
